old:
剣怖イ、切らレル、イタイ
ニンゲン、ぶき、しまっテおいテクレ――
column2:
Sword scary, cut, hurt.
Human, weapon, put away!
speaker: Torogga

old:
ここ、安全
ゴブリン王　ギルスタン強イ！
デモここあたり、怖イ魔物多イ
城取らレル、しんぱい――
column2:
It's safe here,
Goblin King Gilstan is strong!
There are a lot of scary demons around here,
I'm worried they'll take the castle...
speaker: Torogga

old:
しんぱい、タクサン
ジブン弱イ、怖イ、タクサンあル
column2: Worried, lots of things are scary, there are many things.
speaker: Torogga
